title: The perfection of the evangelical revelation a sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, Jan. 6, 1695/6, being the first of the lecture for this present year, founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by John Williams ...

publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill, Senr. & Junr. ...,
